scenes.name: Refill
scenes.description: A light, minimalist map style designed for data visualization overlays.

scenes.name: Cinnabar
scenes.description: A classic web map style for general mapping applications.

scenes.name: Zinc
scenes.description: A dark, minimalist style that helps bright data overlays stand out.

scenes.name: Bubble Wrap
scenes.description: A full-featured wayfinding style loaded with helpful icons for points of interest.

scenes.name: Walkabout
scenes.description: An outdoor style is perfect for hiking or getting out and about, with mountains, ski trails, biking paths, and transit stops.

scenes.name: Tron
scenes.description: An animated style pushing mapping to new extremes with lots of neon.
